name: Potion Cat
description:
Consult the instructions, memorize the ingredients and knock them into the cauldron in the right order.

The complexity of the recipes will increase and the available time will decrease over time. Try to keep up!

Controls:

Jump [space]

Move [a, s, d]

Interact [e]

IMPORTANT HTML:

When playing press F11 so the bottom part of the game doesn't cut. :)
